name: LKLog
description: A lightweight, cross-platform logging library for Arduino. It provides a unified API with printf-style formatting and utilizes native ESP-IDF logging (esp_log) on ESP32 for colored, high-performance output, while falling back to optimized Serial logging on ESP8266 and AVR (Atmega). Ideal for debugging multi-module projects using the Singleton pattern.
keywords: log, esp32, esp8266, atmega, logger, uart, debug
